name: Woodland Adventure Man
description:
Woodland Adventure Man - WAM for short - is a lovely 100% realistic simulator for running scared through the woods. How many Yellow Mysteries can you collect using nothing but your trusty flashlight? The controls are simple - mouse to look around, WASD to move, and mash the spacebar to sprint. How long can you last? (Just a disclaimer, there are no jump scares or extremely loud noises. However, those pesky mugwumps do like to hide behind trees, and it is kinda dark)

Update log:

12/25: Did some major optimizing and fixed it so the sounds would work as intended.
